name: Hylian Hood
description: A hood woven using traditional Hyrulean methods. It's made from a sturdy material to protect travelers from the harsh sun and weather.

name: Hylian Tunic
description: A common garb that achieved widespread popularity in Hyrule, particularly among travelers. Its light-yet-sturdy fabric doesn't limit movement.

name: Hylian Trousers
description: Traditional dress trousers of Hyrule. The plush fabric makes these trousers quite comfortable, and their high durability makes them ideal for travelers.

name: Cap of the Wild
description: According to legend, this cap was crafted for a hero who traves the wild lands. Wearing it just feels so right.

name: Tunic of the Wild
description: This armor was apparently crafted for a hero who travels the wilds. Strangely enough, it's just your size.

name: Trousers of the Wild
description: Legends say these pants were tailored for a hero who travels the wilderness. Strangely enough, they're the most comfortable pair of pants you've ever worn.

name: Zora Helm
description: Zora headgear made from dragon scales. Increases swimming speed and allows you to spin to attack while swimming.

name: Zora Armor
description: Armor crafted by a past Zora princess for her future husband. Equip it to swim up waterfalls.

name: Zora Greaves
description: These greaves have been passed down among the Zora for generations. Equip them to swim faster.

name: Desert Voe Headband
description: Gerudo armor for males. Contains sapphire, which harnesses the power of ice to make the heat more bearable.

name: Desert Voe Spaulder
description: Armor for males sold rarely by Gerudo retailers. It contains sapphire, which harnesses the power of ice to make hot climates more tolerable.

name: Desert Voe Trousers
description: Gerudo-made trousers for males sold rarely by Gerudo retailers. Sapphire is used in their creation, which harnesses the power of ice to make the heat more tolerable.

name: Snowquill Headdress
description: A Rito accessory made from snow-bird feathers. Adorned with a ruby, a gem that harnesses the power of fire.

name: Snowquill Tunic
description: Made by Rito artisans, this tunic stacks molted Rito feathers in each layer to help retain body heat.

name: Snowquill Trousers
description: The Rito feathers that line these trousers make them excellent at retaining body heat.

name: Flamebreaker Helm
description: Stone headgear made for tourists by Goron crafters. Not only is is flame resistant but it also covers your entire head.

name: Flamebreaker Armor
description: Fire-resistant armor crafted by Gorons for Hylians curious enough to visit Goron City.

name: Flamebreaker Boots
description: Goron artisans used flame-resistant rocks to craft these fireproof boots for curious Hylians visiting Goron City.

name: Stealth Mask
description: Sheikah-made mask that suppresses the noisy rustling of clothes. Perfect for sneaking about.

name: Stealth Chest Guard
description: Tights crafted by the Sheikah, laced with ancient technology that suppresses the noisy rustling of clothes.

name: Stealth Tights
description: Armor designed for stealth, passed down through the Sheikah tribe. Its special fabric suppresses sound.

name: Climber's Bandana
description: It may look like a regular bandana, but it's actually infused with ancient technology that enhances core strength to improve your climbing ability.

name: Climbing Gear
description: These rock-climbing boots have special no-slip toes that help you cling to walls. This ancient technology facilitates more nimble climbing.

name: Climbing Boots
description: The ancient technology in this gear will make you a better climber. The special no-slip gloves helps you use your energy more efficiently to facilitate nimble climbing.

name: Radiant Mask
description: A mask made from crushed luminous stones that gives off a radiant glow in the dark.

name: Radiant Shirt
description: A shirt that glows in the dark due to dye made from luminous stones.

name: Radiant Tights
description: Paint made from crushed luminous stones causes these tights to glow in the dark.

name: Soldier's Helm
description: Headgear made from sturdy metals for frontline soldiers. Praised for their defensive capabilities, the only helms that remain are those that survived the Calamity.

name: Soldier's Armor
description: Hyruliean guards praised this armor for its superior defense. Made from sturdy plates of metal, the high level of craftsmanship that went into it is obvious with just a glance.

name: Soldier's Greaves
description: Hyruliean guards favored these greaves. They owe their distinctly high defense to the metal plates they're made from, but the added weight takes some getting used to.

name: Bokoblin Mask
description: Kilton's handmade Bokoblin headgear. It's almost charming in a cute, monstrous kind of way... Equip it to blend in with Bokoblins.

name: Diamond Circlet
description: A Gerudo headpiece set with a diamond, which increases attack power.

name: Ruby Circlet
description: A headpiece made by Gerudo craft workers. It's set with a ruby, a gem that harnesses the power of fire to make cold climates more bearable.

name: Sapphire Circlet
description: An intricate headpiece crafted with Gerudo goldsmith techniques. It's set with a sapphire, a gem that harnesses the power of ice to make hot climates more tolerable.

name: Topaz Earrings
description: Earrings made by Gerudo craft workers. They're made with topaz, a gem that harnesses the power of lighting to increase electricity resistance.

name: Opal Earrings
description: Earrings sold at Gerudo jewelry shops. They contain opal, a gem that harnesses the power of water to increase your swimming speed.

name: Amber Earrings
description: One of the items sold by the Gerudo jeweler. These earrings are made with amber, a gem that harnesses the power of the land to increase defense when equipped.

name: Moblin Mask
description: Kilton's handmade Moblin headgear. It's designed to replicate the distinct, long, Moblin nose and hanging tongue. Equip it to blend in with Moblins.

name: Rubber Helm
description: An electricity-resistant helmet made from an ancient material called "rubber."

name: Rubber Armor
description: This armor owes its electricity resistance to an ancient material called "rubber," which is nearly impossible to find.

name: Rubber Tights
description: These invaluable tights are resistant to electricity. They're made with an ancient technology called "rubber."

name: Barbarian Helm
description: A helmet once worn by the warriors of an ancient warlike tribe from the Faron region.

name: Barbarian Armor
description: Armor once favored by an ancient warlike tribe from the Faron region. Equipping it boosts your attack power.

name: Barbarian Leg Wraps
description: Leg wraps once favored by a warlike tribe. The traditional design bolsters your fighting spirit to raise your strength.

name: Sand Boots
description: Gerudo artisans modified these boots for life in the desert. The special soles distribute weight evenly so you can maintain your normal movement speed on sand.

name: Lizalfos Mask
description: designed to replicate even those goggling eyeballs of the Lizalfos. Equip it to blend in with Lizalfos.

name: Lynel Mask
description: Kilton's handmade Lynel headgear. It's so well crafted it can deceive a real Lynel. Equip it to blend in with Lynels, but don't linger long. Those beasts are smart.

name: Glide Mask
description: A mask with a wind-resistant design that allows for steadier gliding while the wearer plummets from the sky.

name: Glide Shirt
description: The cloth sewn to this shirt helps it "catch" air, increasing the wearer's ability to glide while plummeting from the sky.

name: Glide Tights
description: The cloth sewn to these tights allows their wearer to glide more easily as they plummet from the sky.

name: Ancient Hero's Aspect
description: This item is said to contain the spirit of a hero who once saved Hyrule. That hero's aura will envelop the wearer.

name: Archaic Tunic
description: Old-fashioned upper-body wear. It's got some holes, but the soft cloth feels good to the touch. It's hard to keep wrinkle-free.

name: Archaic Legwear
description: Simple, classic legwear. They're well-worn and showing their age, but they've still got a few good years left in them. It can be a bit cumbersome to have to tie the straps.

name: Archaic Warm Greaves
description: Warm greaves believed to be from a very long time ago. Despite the old look, the heat-retaining material makes it pleasantly resistant to cold temperatures.

name: Froggy Hood
description: A good hood for a rainy day. The perfectly weighted headband keeps the wearer focus and stabilized, making it easier to climb wet, slippery surfaces.

name: Froggy Sleeve
description: A good sleeve for a rainy day. Small dimples on the fingers act as suction cups, giving good grip on wet, slippery surfaces.

name: Froggy Leggings
description: Good leggings for a rainy day. The feet are covered in small dimples and treated with an anti-slip substance, giving them great traction on wet, slippery surfaces.

name: Miner's Mask
description: A mask used for working in darkness. The attached lamps are filled with bioluminescent material to light one's surroundings.

name: Miner's Top
description: A shirt featuring lamps of various sizes filled with bioluminescent material. Made to help with excavating dark environments.

name: Miner's Trousers
description: The bioluminescent lamps on these trousers shed light on where you step. They come in handy when walking in darkness.

name: Ember Headdress
description: Used in ancient rituals, this item is made of heat-absorbing cloth that produces flame in high-temperature environments.

name: Ember Shirt
description: Used in ancient rituals, this item is made of heat-absorbing cloth that produces flame in high-temperature environments.

name: Ember Trousers
description: Used in ancient rituals, this item is made of heat-absorbing cloth that produces flame in high-temperature environments.

name: Charged Headdress
description: Used in ancient rituals and made from conductive material, this item produces electricity during thunderstorms.

name: Charged Shirt
description: Used in ancient rituals and made from conductive material, this item produces electricity during thunderstorms.

name: Charged Trousers
description: Used in ancient rituals and made from conductive material, this item produces electricity during thunderstorms.

name: Frostbite Headdress
description: Used in ancient rituals, this item's cold-absorbing cloth produces frost in low-temperature environments.

name: Frostbite Shirt
description: Used in ancient rituals, this item's cold-absorbing cloth produces frost in low-temperature environments.

name: Frostbite Trousers
description: Used in ancient rituals, this item's cold-absorbing cloth produces frost in low-temperature environments.

name: Cece Hat
description: An avant-garde masterpiece designed by Cece. Guaranteed to make the fashionistas heads turn.

name: Mystic Headpiece
description: Headgear acquired in exchange for Bubbul gems. Made with prayers spirits, it protects the wear allowing them to lose rupees instead of health when hit.

name: Mystic Robe
description: A robe acquired in exchange for Bubbul gems. Made with prayers spirits, it protects the wear allowing them to lose rupees instead of health when hit.

name: Mystic Trousers
description: Trousers acquired in exchange for Bubbul gems. Made with prayers spirits, it protects the wear allowing them to lose rupees instead of health when hit.

name: Zonaite Helm
description: A helmet forged of zonaite. The magic infused into it during its production grants its wearer improved energy efficiency for Zonai devices.

name: Zonaite Waistguard
description: A waistguard made from zonait hile wearing it, you'll reap the benefit of its imbued magic and improve the effieiency of Zonai devices.

name: Zonaite Shin Guards
description: Shin guards forged of zonaite. Wearing them awakens the magic of their creators, improving efficiency for Zonai devices.

name: Mask of Awakening
description: Legend says this mask resembles a hero who explored a mysterious place that one could visit but not leave.

name: Tunic of Awakening
description: Legend says this armor was worn by a hero who explored a mysterious area that one could visit but not leave.

name: Trousers of Awakening
description: Legend says these trousers were worn by a hero who explored a mysterious island that one could visit but not leave.

name: Champion's Leathers
description: This garment, worn by those in good standing with Hyrule royalty, has been reworked with the latest improvements, such a new shoulder guard.

name: Horriblin Mask
description: Kilton's handmade Horriblin headgear. The big nose and smiley mouth look just like those of the real monster... Equip it to blend in with Horriblins.'

name: Hood of the Depths
description: A hood acquired by offering Poes to a strange statue found in the Depths. It offers some resistance to gloom.

name: Tunic of the Depths
description: A tunic acquired by offering Poes to a strange statue found in the Depths. It offers some resistance to gloom.

name: Gaiters of the Depths
description: Gaiters acquired by offering Poes to a strange statue found in the Depths. They offer some resistance to gloom.

name: Well-worn Hair Band
description: An old, worn, simple hair band. Its color has long faded, but it still has some life left in it. Wearing it in your hair makes you sentimental about times past.

name: Tunic of Memories
description: In ancient Hyrule, this garment could only be worn by one who had earned the respect of the royal family. It's dyed in vibrant blue.

name: Yiga Mask
description: A mask supplied to members of the Yiga Clan. It covers the entire face, keeping even breath sounds to a minimum. Perfect sneaking, but lacks protection due to its light material.

name: Yiga Armor
description: Armor supplied to members of the Yiga Clan. Defensive parts are minimized for silence, so it's lacking in protection.

name: Yiga Tights
description: Tights supplied to members of the Yiga Clan. The soft material on the soles silences footsteps, but protection is lacking due to the light material.

name: Snow Boots
description: Boots designed for hiking up snowy mountains. They evenly distribute your body weight so you can maintain your normal movement speed on deep snow.

name: Dark Hood
description: Headwear obtained by offering Poes to a strange statue. It resembles the head of a monster born of shadow, and its eyes glow eerie red in the dark.

name: Dark Tunic
description: Trousers obtained by offering Poes to a strange statue. They look ordinary at first, but on closer inspection, they resemble the legs of a monster born of shadow.

name: Dark Trousers
description: A tunic obtained by offering Poes to a strange statue. It's a spurious replica of the green outfit once worn by a legendary hero.

name: Phantom Helmet
description: Myths abound about armored phantoms that terrorized brave heroes. This helmet looks just like the ones they supposedly wore. It's a rather rare find.

name: Phantom Armor
description: Myths abound about armored phantoms that terrorized brave heroes. This piece looks just like the armor they allegedly wore. It's a rather rare find.

name: Phantom Greaves
description: Myths abound about armored phantoms that terrorized brave heroes. These greaves look just like the ones they supposedly wore. It's a rather rare find.

name: Majora's Mask
description: An eerie mask passed down from ancient times. Wearing it makes it harder for certain enemies to spot you. It's a rather rare find.

name: Midna's Helmet
description: A helmet much like the one Midna wore when she fought alongside the Hero of Twilight. It's a rather rare find.

name: Tingle's Hood
description: There was once a man who claimed to be the very reincarnation of a fairy. He treasured this hood, and so will you. After all, it's a rather rare find. Kooloo-Limpah.

name: Tingle's Shirt
description: There was once a man who claimed to be the very reincarnation of a fairy. He treasured this hood, and so will you. After all, it's a rather rare find. Kooloo-Limpah.

name: Tingle's Tights
description: There was once a man who claimed to be the very reincarnation of a fairy. He treasured this hood, and so will you. After all, it's a rather rare find. Kooloo-Limpah.

name: Island Lobster Shirt
description: A soft, comfortable shirt traditional to a southern island. It's made of breathable fabric, so it's well suited to warm regions.

name: Korok Mask
description: A mask inspired by those fun-loving Koroks. It shakes when one is nearby. It's a rather rare find.

name: Ravio's Hood
description: The hood of a traveling merchant who had a bracelet that could turn the wearer into a painting. Wearing it increases your sideways climbing speed. It's a rather rare find.

name: Zant's Helmet
description: The ruthless Usurper King of the Twilight Realm wore a helmet much like this one. It's a rather rare find.

name: Royal Guard Cap
description: This spiffy cap is part of the uniform for Hyrule's royal guard. It's lighter than it looks and easy to move around in.

name: Royal Guard Uniform
description: The dignified uniform for Hyrule's royal guard. It's made of high-quality materials and is both stylish and practical.

name: Royal Guard Boots
description: These boots are part of the uniform for Hyrule's royal guard. They're a fine blend of style and function.

name: Evil Spirit Mask
description: Some believe this eerie mask is inspired by a malevolent entity. It's a rather rare find.

name: Evil Spirit Armor
description: Some believe this armor is inspired by a malevolent entity. It's a rather rare find.

name: Evil Spirit Greaves
description: Some believe these greaves are inspired by a malevolent entity. It's a rather rare find.

name: Vah Ruta Divine Helm
description: A helm worn by a warrior who protected the Zora in a time beyond memory. It's said to deepen the bond with the Zora when worn by a Hylian.

name: Vah Medoh Divine Helm
description: A helm worn by a warrior who protected the Rito in a time beyond memory. It's said to deepen the bond with the Rito when worn by a Hylian.

name: Vah Rudania Divine Helm
description: A helm worn by a warrior who protected the Gorons in a time beyond memory. It's said to deepen the bond with the Rito when worn by a Hylian.

name: Vah Naboris Divine Helm
description: A helm worn by a warrior who protected the Gerudo in a time beyond memory. It's said to deepen the bond with the Rito when worn by a Hylian.

name: Cap of Time
description: According to legend, this cap was once worn by a hero who traveled through time. A truly timeless item perfect for kids and adults alike!

name: Tunic of Time
description: Legend has it that this armor was once worn by a hero who traveled through time. Strangely, its special design is fitted for children and adults alike.

name: Trousers of Time
description: Legends say these trousers were once worn by a hero who traveled through time. They were originally made by a people who made their home in the forest.

name: Cap of the Wind
description: According to legend, this cap was treasured by a hero who travelled the Great Sea. It flaps quite serenely in a soft sea breeze.

name: Tunic of the Wind
description: Legend has it this armor was once cherished by a hero who sailed the Great Sea. It's said to have been a gift from his grandmother.

name: Trousers of the Wind
description: Legends say these trousers were cherished by a hero who sailed the Great Sea. They're water-resistant, naturally.

name: Cap of Twilight
description: According to legend, this cap was worn by a hero who battled the creatures of twilight.

name: Tunic of Twilight
description: Legend has it this armor was worn by a hero who battled monsters of twilight. It looks like some wolf hair is still stuck to it...

name: Trousers of Twilight
description: Legends say these trousers were once worn by a hero who battled the beasts of twilight.

name: Cap of the Sky
description: According to legend, this cap was once worn by a hero who appeared from the sky riding a mighty bird.

name: Tunic of the Sky
description: Legend has it this armor was worn by a hero who rode a mighty bird. It was apparently presented after a ceremonious event.

name: Trousers of the Sky
description: Legends say these trousers were once worn by a hero who appeared from the sky riding a mighty bird.

name: Shiek's Mask
description: A mask said to have been worn by a Sheikah who saved a time-traveling hero. Made from the finest of Sheikah stealth fabrics, it is the final word in undercover gear

name: Fierce Deity Mask
description: A mask worn by a hero from a world in which the moon was falling, granting godlike power.

name: Fierce Deity Armor
description: Armor worn by the hero from a world in which the moon threatened to fall. Wearing it provides godlike power.

name: Fierce Deity Boots
description: Boots worn by a hero from a world in which the moon threatened to fall. Wearing them provides godlike power.

name: Cap of the Hero
description: According to legend, this cap was once treasures by an ancient hero. It's quite the simple cap, yet there is something about it that's just so appealingâ€¦

name: Tunic of the Hero
description: Legend has it this armor was once cherished by a hero from ancient times. Its design is rather simple, but it's such a traditional look.

name: Trousers of the Hero
description: Legends say these trousers were favoured by a hero from an ancient age. Their simple design is a rare aesthetic these days, but there's something classic about them.
